mapper.insert: insert into tb_zhongxinzhen ( centertownname, number, citypilot, townlevel, townfeature, sys_province, sys_city, sys_town, cooperation, towndatayear, hundredcounties, countygdp, countyrevenue, townpopulation, townpgdi, townarea, community, adminvillage, townlocalgdp, townrevenue, totalpopulation, farmingoutvalue, industryoutvalue, serviceoutvalue, weather, terrain, traffic, currentindustry, industrialorientation, historyculture, honorarytitle, partycommittee, committelnumber, committel, mayor, mayortelnumber, mayortel, contacts, post, contactstel, statuspic, planpic, creator, updatetime) values ( #{centertownname}, #{number}, #{citypilot}, #{townlevel}, #{townfeature}, #{townprovince}, #{towncity}, #{towntown}, #{cooperation}, #{towndatayear}, #{hundredcounties}, #{countygdp}, #{countyrevenue}, #{townpopulation}, #{townpgdi}, #{townarea}, #{community}, #{adminvillage}, #{townlocalgdp}, #{townrevenue}, #{totalpopulation}, #{farmingoutvalue}, #{industryoutvalue}, #{serviceoutvalue}, #{weather}, #{terrain}, #{traffic}, #{currentindustry}, #{industrialorientation}, #{historyculture}, #{honorarytitle}, #{partycommittee}, #{committelnumber}, #{committel}, #{mayor}, #{mayortelnumber}, #{mayortel}, #{contacts}, #{post}, #{contactstel}, #{statuspic}, #{planpic}, #{creator}, now())
mapper.select:
select t.* from tb_zhongxinzhen t where 1=1
and (t.number like '%${search}%' or t.centertownname like '%${search}%' or t.townlevel like '%${search}%')

select count(*) from tb_zhongxinzhen t where 1=1
and (t.number like '%${search}%' or t.centertownname like '%${search}%' or t.townlevel like '%${search}%')
select t.* from tb_zhongxinzhen t where t.centertownid=#{centertownid}
mapper.update: update tb_zhongxinzhen set centertownname=#{centertownname}, number=#{number}, citypilot=#{citypilot}, townlevel=#{townlevel}, townfeature=#{townfeature}, sys_province=#{sys_province}, sys_city=#{sys_city}, sys_town=#{sys_town}, cooperation=#{cooperation}, towndatayear=#{towndatayear}, hundredcounties=#{hundredcounties}, countygdp=#{countygdp}, countyrevenue=#{countyrevenue}, townpopulation=#{townpopulation}, townpgdi=#{townpgdi}, townarea=#{townarea}, community=#{community}, adminvillage=#{adminvillage}, townlocalgdp=#{townlocalgdp}, townrevenue=#{townrevenue}, totalpopulation=#{totalpopulation}, farmingoutvalue=#{farmingoutvalue}, industryoutvalue=#{industryoutvalue}, serviceoutvalue=#{serviceoutvalue}, weather=#{weather}, terrain=#{terrain}, traffic=#{traffic}, currentindustry=#{currentindustry}, industrialorientation=#{industrialorientation}, historyculture=#{historyculture}, honorarytitle=#{honorarytitle}, partycommittee=#{partycommittee}, committelnumber=#{committelnumber}, committel=#{committel}, mayor=#{mayor}, mayortelnumber=#{mayortelnumber}, mayortel=#{mayortel}, contacts=#{contacts}, post=#{post}, contactstel=#{contactstel}, statuspic=#{statuspic}, planpic=#{planpic}, creator=#{creator}, updatetime=now() where centertownid=#{centertownid}
